detailsSection:
This document gives an overview of the Microsoft Platform Ready Program and details the prerequisites and test criteria for all the products that are covered by the Microsoft Platform Ready program.  

The Microsoft Platform Ready Test Tool is designed to help test your applications for compatibility with latest technologies and platforms from Microsoft. Use this tool to achieve testing status in the Microsoft Platform Ready programs.
The MPR Test Tool is an automated, wizard style self-test tool that implements technical requirements described in the Microsoft Platform Ready Test Requirements.
This tool is also recommended for Customers to evaluate third party applications and for testing Line of Business applications.
